name: Trashpanda (Miss Nemesis)
description:
Trashpanda is a Timing based 2D Pixel Platformer in which you play as Rascal the Raccoon. 

Help him to find food to save his family from starving!

Collect Trashbins to enter the next Levels and discover the dangerous world of a Raccoon.

Controls Keyboard

Walk - A/D & Arrowkeys

Jump - Space

Dash - Shift

Pause - Esc & P

Gamepad

Walk - Left Stick & D-Pad Left/Right

Jump - South Button

Dash - Right Shoulder

Pause - Start

All sounds from EpidemicSound Font used: Press Start 2P Artwork created in Aseprite and Photoshop Made with Unity
